name: The Good Bat
description:
Game Controls: WASD or Arrow keys to move, space to pick up and drop items, left mouse click to call the miner, right mouse click to make him stop immediately and R to use your ultrasound and see your sorroundings clearly for a brief period of time.

A lost miner is stuck underground and you can help him out of the cave! Guide him and protect him from the dangers you may find. But remember, the miner's vision is quite limited so if he needs to interact with anything he may need the help of a powerfull light source.

This protoype was made under 48 hours for the global game jam.

GameDesing: Nahuel Lopez, Facundo Santos, Juan Pablo Bortol, Fabrizzio Leonardo Morandi.

2D Art: Facundo Santos.

Music/SFX: Federico Gutiérrez Clas.

Programming: Juan Pablo Bortol, Fabrizzio Leonardo Morandi.
